[00:00.00]Right Back - Khalid
[00:06.85]Lyrics by：Khalid Robinson/Mikkel Storleer Eriksen/Tor Erik Hermansen/Denis Kosiak/Jamil Chammas/Ryan Vojtesak/Mike "Scribz" Riley/Rodney Jerkins/Brenda Russell/Jolyon Skinner/Japhe Tejeda/Joe Thomas/Michelle Williams
[00:13.71]Composed by：Khalid Robinson/Mikkel Storleer Eriksen/Tor Erik Hermansen/Denis Kosiak/Jamil Chammas/Ryan Vojtesak/Mike "Scribz" Riley/Rodney Jerkins/Brenda Russell/Jolyon Skinner/Japhe Tejeda/Joe Thomas/Michelle Williams
[00:20.56]Power
[00:22.64]Got me sittin' by my phone I've been waiting for hours
[00:27.51]On my line sending mirror pics of you fresh out the shower
[00:32.27]So I might as well swing over to your place
[00:40.17]It's crowded
[00:42.20]In LA but I'll be there at 8 if the traffic allows it
[00:47.04]Say you're down I could show you around
[00:49.03]If you're really about it yeah
[00:52.08]But for you I got something to prove what do you say
[00:56.80]What do you say
[00:58.98]Should we bring it right back
[01:00.26]Honestly it's better like that
[01:02.52]I know we've been falling off track
[01:04.19]Bring it right back
[01:05.37]I just let the time roll past
[01:07.31]We don't gotta take it too fast
[01:09.05]Bring it right back
[01:10.26]You don't gotta stay the night
[01:12.40]I just wanna take the time
[01:15.31]I know all the things you like
[01:17.37]Maybe if the mood is right
[01:18.88]We can bring it right back
[01:20.21]Saved
[01:21.79]Got the weed we can sit by the beach if we wanna get faded
[01:26.56]But if that's not the vibe yeah it's cool
[01:28.60]We can save it for later yeah
[01:31.62]I just like the way it feels when you're around
[01:36.20]When you're around ah
[01:38.53]Now I know we're not dating nah
[01:41.26]Maybe soon by the way things go we've been talking for ages
[01:46.42]Take it step by step slow it down we just need to be patient love
[01:51.47]If the love feels good and it's real it'll all work out
[01:56.02]It'll all work out yeah
[01:58.44]Should we bring it right back
[02:00.01]Honestly it's better like that

data.trans:
[ti:Right Back]
[ar:Khalid]
[al:Free Spirit]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:06.85]//
[00:13.70]//
[00:20.56]充满力量
[00:22.64]你让我坐在电话旁边等了好几个小时
[00:27.51]你发消息过来 给我看你美人出浴的自拍照
[00:32.27]所以 我临时决定去你家找你
[00:40.17]路上很堵
[00:42.20]此刻我在洛杉矶 如果路况还好的话 我8点左右应该能到
[00:47.04]你说你心情不好 我可以带你四处逛逛
[00:49.03]如果你愿意的话
[00:52.08]但我要向你证明一些事情 你说什么
[00:56.80]你说什么
[00:58.98]我们应该回到过去的状态吗
[01:00.26]老实说 那样当然更好啦
[01:02.52]我知道我们都有点跑偏了
[01:04.19]回到过去
[01:05.37]我要让时间倒流
[01:07.31]我们不必太着急
[01:09.05]回到过去
[01:10.26]你不必通宵达旦
[01:12.40]我只想放慢节奏
[01:15.31]我知道你所有的喜好
[01:17.37]如果情绪到位的话
[01:18.88]我们可以回到过去
[01:20.21]如获新生
[01:21.79]准备好** 如果想彻底放纵一次 我们可以坐在海边
[01:26.56]就算我们情绪不对 也没关系
[01:28.60]我们以后再说
[01:31.62]我只是很喜欢你陪在我身边的感觉
[01:36.20]你陪在我身边
[01:38.53]我知道我们现在不算是约会
[01:41.26]也许事情很快就有转机 我们聊了很久
[01:46.42]一步一步来 放慢节奏 在爱情里 我们都需要耐心一点
[01:51.47]如果你感觉爱情美好又真实 那就对了
[01:56.02]努力总会有结果的
[01:58.44]我们应该回到过去的状态吗
[02:00.01]老实说 那样当然更好啦
